text: Skazhi, o prorok, etim upryamym: "Zadumaytes' o znameniyakh na nebesakh i na zemle, kotoryye dokazyvayut, chto net bozhestva, krome Allakha Yedinogo, i ubedyat vas verit'!" No uveshchevaniya i znameniya, kakimi by oni ni byli yasnymi i ubeditel'nymi, ne pomogut nerazumnym, neblagodarnym lyudyam
